query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_categories,
  SUM(CASE WHEN parentId IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as parent_categories,
  SUM(CASE WHEN parentId IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as subcategories
FROM categories;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3oR8r6zhvNA54kM.root --database 7P2s8YLp8Q4WBmq2Lyj4MG --execute SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_categories,
  SUM(CASE WHEN parentId IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as parent_categories,
  SUM(CASE WHEN parentId IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as subcategories
FROM categories;
